A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolutely beautiful. This movie is so much more substantial than The Force Awakens. Very philosophical\, and provides an insightful development of each of the characters that is very satisfying. If all you want out of Star Wars is battles and explosions\, maybe this isn't for you\, but if you want a space opera that as charming as the originals with the strong thematic material of the prequels\, this movie is incredibly satisfying.
